trans-unit.source: Identifies the enumerated type properties of a visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 标识视觉样式元素的枚举类型属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty> enumeration represents a set of enumerated properties that describe visual style elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty>枚举表示一组描述视觉样式元素的枚举属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty> values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty>值用作中的自变量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以指定要检索的元素的属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>当前表示。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType" /> values that specifies how the element's background is drawn.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType" /> 值之一，指定如何绘制此元素的背景。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BorderType" /> values that specifies the border type for elements with a filled-border background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BorderType" /> 值之一，指定带有填充边框背景的元素的边框类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ContentAlignment" /> values that specifies how text is aligned in a window caption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ContentAlignment" /> 值之一，指定窗口标题文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FillType" /> values that specifies the fill type for elements with a filled-border background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FillType" /> 值之一，指定带有填充边框背景的元素的填充类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType" /> values that specifies when the visual style selects a different glyph font size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType" /> 值之一，指定视觉样式何时选择不同的标志符号字体大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphType" /> values that specifies the type of glyph for elements with a bitmap background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphType" /> 值之一，指定带有位图背景的元素的标志符号类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HorizontalAlign" /> values that specifies the horizontal alignment for elements with a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HorizontalAlign" /> 值之一，为具有固定大小的元素指定水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect" /> values that specifies the effect that the visual style will apply to an icon.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect" /> 值之一，指定视觉样式将应用于某个图标的效果。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageOrientation" /> values that specifies how multiple images are arranged in a single image file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageOrientation" /> 值之一，指定如何在单个图像文件中排列多个图像。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType" /> values that specifies when the visual style selects a different multiple-image file to draw an element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType" /> 值之一，指定视觉样式何时选择一个不同的多图像文件来绘制元素。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.OffsetType" /> values that specifies where an offset is applied to a window element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.OffsetType" /> 值之一，指定在窗口元素上应用偏移的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.SizingType" /> values that specifies how elements with a bitmap background will adjust to fill the bounds.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.SizingType" /> 值之一，指定如何调整带有位图背景的元素以充满边界。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextShadowType" /> values that specifies the type of shadow to add to text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextShadowType" /> 值之一，指定要添加到文本的阴影的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrueSizeScalingType" /> values that specifies when the visual style rescales an element with a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrueSizeScalingType" /> 值之一，指定视觉样式何时重新缩放具有固定大小的元素。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VerticalAlignment" /> values that specifies the vertical alignment for elements with a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VerticalAlignment" /> 值之一，为具有固定大小的元素指定垂直对齐方式。
